[et_pb_section bb_built=”1″][et_pb_row][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.17.6″ header_text_color=”#ed1c24″]

Nous joindre

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row][et_pb_column type=”1_2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.17.6″]

Addresse

1333 Avenue Stravinski, Brossard, QC J4X 2C5

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.17.6″]

Heures

Lundi à Vendredi: 9:00 AM à 5:00 PM
Samedi et Dimanche: 11:00 à 4:00 PM

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.17.6″ link_text_color=”#ed1c24″]

Courriel: vdargan@videotron.ca
Téléphone: 514 946-1756

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
